Articles.Content: How much memory does KSP need free of it's 4GB to be safe? I've just added another 3 mods to my collection and KSP is using 3650MB in the science building

Depends on the mods you install. If you have any huge part packs (B9, KW etc), you can use a texture reduction pack. It's somewhere in the addon forum.

Can't remember it tho...
Well this is what I have installed

*faints*

I've no doubt that that'll probably bring most computers to their knees, although a Linux installation might be able to handle it unaltered. I'd recommend taking down the texture detail settings to half-res or quarter-res, at the least, with that kind of a setup.

The 32bit architecture of the game limits memory usage.

You will never benefit of more then 4gb free ram until this changes
